word_mean: 土壤剖面中最靠近地表的一个层次（A层），该层土壤富含腐殖质，一般厚度20～30cm，黑土和黑钙土的A层厚度可达50～100cm。

sentence.Network_en: A thin layer of topsoil was swept away.
sentence.Network_cn: 薄薄的一层表土被冲走了。

sentence.Network_en: The topsoil has been almost completely washed away.
sentence.Network_cn: 表层土壤已差不多完全给冲走了.

sentence.Network_en: This causes environmental damage when the topsoil is washed away by the rains.
sentence.Network_cn: 雨水冲走表层土壤会造成环境破坏。

表土剥离表土剥离(Topsoil stripping)是指将建设用地或露天开采用地(包括临时性或永久性用地)所涉及到的适合耕种的表层土壤剥离出来,用于原地或异地土地复垦、土壤.

entry.def: Topsoil is the layer of soil nearest the surface of the ground.

means.word_mean: 1. the layer of soil on the surface
